post_text:
Hi We are currently hiring for Experienced PMT Professionals 

1. Sr Product Manager / Group Product Manager 
Candidate should have experience of handling big brands 
Location is Gandhinagar, Gujarat 
Experience in Cardio Diabeto is preferred 

2. Product Manager-1
Therapy : Cardio Diabetic 
Minimum 2-3 years of PMT experience 
Location : Ahmedabad 

3. Product Executive -1 
Therapy : Cardio Diabetic 
Minimum 2-3 years of PMT experience 
Location : Ahmedabad 

Interested candidates are requested to reach out to Rajneesh Negi or drop their resume at pmtindiajobs@gmail.com 

You can also enrol here to receive future job updates : https://lnkd.in/gVchm_7M
